content: pattern details unley chill beanie osfm beanie with measurements as follows 80 chains circumference in 8ply/ dk weight results in ~53cm/ ~21 relaxed circumference at brim and ~22cm/ ~8 5 length from brim to peak this is a medium to large women s/ small to medium men s size note the stitches used for this beanie do give a few cm of stretch when worn resizing tips are provided in this document original design by the crochet fix skill level advanced beginner to intermediate stitch terminology us refer to abbreviations for stitches used yarn 8 ply/ cat 3/ dk weight wool or wool mix ~120 grams/ ~4 2 ounces in total hook 4 mm/ size g gauge first four rounds should result in circle with ~53 cm/ ~21 diameter one square/ block should be ~ 2 5cm/ 1 wide by ~2 5cm/ 1 tall remember to spam me #unleychillbeanie @thecrochetfix on social media with your finished projects these have been my go to charity beanie over the 20 odd years i have been making them as they are warm but also look really nice add a pom pom for some extra charm this is an original pattern by farrah jane tate you are welcome to sell products you ve madeusing my patterns however i ask that you refer to the
